metadata.dc:title: ROSS Benchmark Runs
metadata.dc:creator: Mark Plagge
metadata.dc:subject: Parallel Discrete Event Simulations
metadata.dc:description: This data contains performance metrics from running ROSS (Rensselaer's Optimistic Simulation System) with several tuned parameters. The goal is to provide guidelines for setting runtime options when running a ROSS system. The simulation run is the standard PHOLD simulation
metadata.dcterms:provenance: Data created by running simulations at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute
PHOLD simulation ran with default parameters, these defaults are removed from the data set for simplicity.
